name: Filo Spacing System
description: Consistent spacing scale for all Filo apps

01.usage: Micro spacing - icon padding, tight gaps

02.usage: Small spacing - between related elements, button padding

03.usage: Medium-small spacing - list item gaps, card padding

04.usage: Medium spacing - section padding, standard gaps

05.usage: Medium-large spacing - container padding, between sections

07.usage: Extra large spacing - page margins, hero sections
